Class CardGameServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardGameServer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BigTwoServer

    public class CardGameServer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to model a card game server.
    Author:
    Kenneth Wong

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CardGameServer(java.lang.String serverName, int maxNumOfPlayers)
      Creates and returns an instance of the BigTwoServer class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CardGameServer

        public CardGameServer(java.lang.String serverName,
                      int maxNumOfPlayers)
        Creates and returns an instance of the BigTwoServer class.
        Parameters:
        serverName - the name of this card game server
        maxNumOfPlayers - the maximum number of players in a card game
